tool_description: Retrieves transaction history for cryptocurrency addresses with filtering options, pagination, and detailed transaction information including inputs, outputs, and confirmations.

address.description: Cryptocurrency address to fetch transactions for

blockchain_type.description: Blockchain network: bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, dogecoin, bitcoin_cash

limit.description: Maximum number of transactions to retrieve (1-100)

transaction_type.description: Filter by transaction type: all, incoming, outgoing

error_messages: Invalid address format: Address format is not valid for the specified blockchain.
Unsupported blockchain: Use one of [bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, dogecoin, bitcoin_cash].
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date.
Limit exceeded: Maximum 100 transactions per request.
Invalid transaction type: Use one of [all, incoming, outgoing].
API rate limit exceeded: Too many requests, try again later.
usage: Provide address and blockchain_type, optionally set limit, date range, transaction_type, and min_confirmations for filtered results.

transactions.description: Array of transaction data as JSON strings

total_received.description: Total amount received by the address

total_sent.description: Total amount sent from the address
